title: Jermlaine

The **jermlaine** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that first appeared in [SLASH 6](/wiki/SLASH_6 "SLASH 6"), the precursor to [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It is not part of [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Code for the monster appears in the source for SLASH'EM, but the code is commented out, making it a [deferred feature](/wiki/Deferred_feature "Deferred feature").

Jermlaine are included in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Description](#Description)
- [2 Origin](#Origin)
- [3 References](#References)
- [4 See also](#See_also)

## Description

The jermlaine is a weak creature with a single melee attack. A single jermlaine is relatively harmless, but the [large groups](/wiki/Group "Group") of jermlaine which usually appear are a bigger threat.

## Origin

Jermlaine come from D\&D. They are small, humanoid fey creatures that dwell underground.

## References

- SLASH 6 monst.c#line550
- SLASH 6 monstr.c#line 9

## See also

- [Galltrit](/wiki/Galltrit "Galltrit"), another deferred SLASH'EM monster from SLASH 6

Jermlaine

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Jermlaine
g jermlaine (No tile)
Difficulty 2
Attacks Claw 1d2 physical
g jermlaine (No tile)
Difficulty 2
Attacks

Claw 1d2 physical

Base level 0

Speed 15
Base AC 7
Base MR 0
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 100
Nutritional value 20
Size Small
Resistances poison

A jermlaine:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
  • normally appears in very large groups.
Reference SLASH 6 monst.c#line550

The jermlaine is a monster that first appeared in SLASH 6, the precursor to SLASH'EM. It is not part of NetHack 3.4.3. Code for the monster appears in the source for SLASH'EM, but the code is commented out, making it a deferred feature.

Jermlaine are included in SlashTHEM.

Jermlaine are included in [[SlashTHEM]].

==Description==
The jermlaine is a weak creature with a single melee attack.  A single jermlaine is relatively harmless, but the [[group|large groups]] of jermlaine which usually appear are a bigger threat.

==Origin==
Jermlaine come from D&D.  They are small, humanoid fey creatures that dwell underground.
